acceptedAnswer.text: Fragment Telegram scams exploit Telegram's strengths and its fragmentation feature to deceive users. Scammers typically create fake groups or channels promising exclusive content or financial gains to trap users.

mainEntity.name: What tactics do Fragment Telegram scammers use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Their tactics include social engineering, phishing links, and malware distribution, advance fee fraud, and impersonation of authorities. These methods aim to defraud users by tricking them into sharing sensitive information or money.

mainEntity.name: How can I prevent becoming a victim of Fragment Telegram scams?

acceptedAnswer.text: Prevention strategies include verifying the authenticity of groups, staying informed about potential scams, using two-factor authentication, being cautious of unsolicited requests, keeping software updated, and avoiding suspicious links and downloads.

mainEntity.name: What should I do if I fall victim to a Telegram scam?

acceptedAnswer.text: If you are scammed, report the incident to Telegram's support team and inform your financial institutions. Additionally, notify local authorities and cybersecurity bodies to help prevent further incidents.
